name: Muckraker Punch
description: This drink from Jim Romdall at Seattle's Vessel shows what a few more refined spirits will do to a punch. VSOP Cognac and aged sherry are lightened by the apricot and lemon.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce fresh lemon juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cognac, sherry, apricot liqueur, lemon juice, and bitters in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into ice-filled glass. Garnish with lime twist.
